data.text:
Let me start with the negative feedback first;
I don't know what they wanted to ensure, but they asked for a card to ensure entry. I asked when I was leaving, card information was automatically deleted. There were already 2 small drinks in the minibar so there was nothing to guarantee. The modern and innovative architecture in the lobby is not reflected in the rooms. The rooms are more like a hostel. The room I stayed in was old, the air conditioning button looked like it would be left in my hand. I told the receptionist and they fixed it during the day. I couldn't figure out the smell in the room. There is a huge fan/propeller in the room that I cannot understand. They were no water in the room. There were granular coffees that dissolved in water, but the milk was in small cans! 
It's a spa hotel but I didn't see any bathrobes or slippers.

My positive feedback
Approximately 10 minutes walking distance from Collblanc metro station. You have the privilege of passing by Barcelona Nou Camp stadium on your way to the metro. You may get an omelet for the breakfast. Cheese and fruit varieties were rich. Breakfast was generally enjoyable with dairy products, jams, and coffee varieties. I don't know how the breakfast buffet of a 4-star hotel in a destination boasting of its olives could not have olives.
There is a fixed iron in the room which is not very easy to use. First, you need to press the iron icon and then press the on/off button. Basic bathroom accessories are available. No slippers. I have no comment as I did not use the spa or pool.
I don't know if I will come again, but I can recommend it in terms of price / benefit.
data.title: you may get values of your money

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 
We would firstly like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at our hotel.  
We have taken your suggestions on board to make the necessary improvements as soon as possible. We aim to make your stay a unique experience and to meet all of your  expectations, and we strive to improve every day to make sure that happens.  
We look forward to welcoming you once again to our hotel. 
Sincerely yours, 
Elena S.
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: ILUNION Hoteles

data.text:
Javier is a star ,multitasking and friendly.
Other staff friendly and well trained.
Large well appointed rooms.
Great housekeeping.
Clean throughout.
Spa overpriced .
Breakfast cold on all 3 days.
Location fine if you don't mind taking buses in to the centre.
Would stay again.
X
data.title: BARCELONA

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rachel,
Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We are happy to read that your stay at our hotel exceeded your expectations in most of our services. 
Ensuring our guests' comfort is always our top priority.  We are pleased that we could provide you with a perfect service. It's wonderful to hear that Javier, our receptionist, made a positive impression with their kindness and helpfulness.
Your feedback means a lot to us as we continuously strive to provide exceptional service to all our guests.
If you come again to Barcelona, we would be delighted to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.
Best regards, 
Elena S. 
Hotel Manager.
owner_response.author: ILUNION Hoteles

data.text: Travelling for business. Hotel bar is closing at 23.00 sharp and personnel actually does not like to serve you there already some minutes before. Please be aware of that. When you have a show like ISE or Mobile World and want to have a beer to close the day with some colleagues then consider this before you book. In general, i would say this hotel i just above average.
data.title: Business stay during ISE 2024

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sir,
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We sincerely regret not being able to address your concerns during your stay. 
We apologize for not meeting your needs at our Hotel.
Your feedback is highly valuable, and we will use it to reassess and enhance our services for other future guests. 
Best regards,
Elena S. 
Hotel Manager.
owner_response.author: ILUNION Hoteles

data.text: We spent four nights at the Ilunion Barcelona Ramon Tores Hotel for Christmas 2023 as a family. We are very disappointed overall with the services of the hotel. The rooms were not cleaned properly. Towels, toiletries, water were missing, and we had to call the reception often. Very poor cleaning of rooms. The breakfast was fine; however, one of the mangers behaved very unethically.  My sister and her husband usually have a coffee/juice prior to walking and then have breakfast. One of the mangers told them it is not allowed since it is considered to eat twice; that was the first time experiencing that. They travel a lot and have no such an issue around the world. However, the manger on duty yelled at them and behaved in such unprofessional manner. The only good thing about this hotel is the location near the water, metro is not far; however, its far from the center and not in a modern area of Barcelona.
data.title: Poor services, not recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,
After carefully reviewing your review on TripAdvisor, we would like to inform you that your words are adressed to our colleagues from Ilunion Barcelona Hotel. Please note that we are Ilunion Les Corts Hotel located near Camp Nou. 
Anyway, we will let them know and I'm sure they will appreciate the time you have taken to share you feedbak. In Ilunion Hotels we always strive to improve and provide exceptional service to our valued guests. 
Best regards,
Elena S. 
Hotel Manager.
owner_response.author: ILUNION Hoteles

data.text: Service great and cleanliness great. Breakfast good Wi-Fi good.  Gym small but recently renewed. That’s about it. I felt very welcome by the staff who did a great deal to help me. But the rest of the hotel and experience is dated. Year 70’s old rebranded hotel. But don’t go off my review as the they are renovating. As of now it was only the lobby but they sure continue with the rooms. I slept well, the beds are still comfortable and that’s important. Location nothing special if you are not set to be there.
data.title: Good hotel under renovation
